trans-unit.source: The **Get-NetworkSwitchEthernetPort** cmdlet now returns the following additional information with instances:
trans-unit.target: **Get NetworkSwitchEthernetPort** cmdlet 现在返回以下包含实例的附加信息：

trans-unit.source: IPAddress – the IP address associated with the port
trans-unit.target: IPAddress – 与端口相关联的 IP 地址

trans-unit.source: PortMode – the port mode: access, route, or trunk
trans-unit.target: PortMode – 端口模式：Access、Route 或 Trunk

trans-unit.source: AccessVLAN – the ID of the VLAN associated with this port in access mode
trans-unit.target: AccessVLAN – Access 模式中与此端口相关联的 VLAN 的 ID

trans-unit.source: TrunkedVLANList – a list of IDs of VLANs associated with this port in trunk mode
trans-unit.target: TrunkedVLANList – Trunk 模式中与此端口相关联的 VLAN 的 ID 列表

trans-unit.source: Fundamental network switch management with Windows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell 基本网络交换机管理

trans-unit.source: The Network Switch cmdlets, introduced in the first WMF 5.0 Preview, enable you to apply switch, virtual LAN (VLAN), and basic Layer 2 network switch port configuration to Windows Server 2012 R2 logo-certified network switches.
trans-unit.target: 在第一个 WMF 5.0 预览版中引入的网络交换机 cmdlet 让你能够将交换机、虚拟 LAN (VLAN) 和基本第 2 层网络交换机端口配置应用到 Windows Server 2012 R2 徽标认证的网络交换机。

trans-unit.source: Microsoft remains committed to supporting the [Datacenter Abstraction](http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/cloud/dal.aspx) Layer (DAL) vision, and to show value for our customers and partners in this space.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 仍致力于支持[数据中心抽象](http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/cloud/dal.aspx)层 (DAL) 的愿景，从而为这一领域中的客户和合作伙伴彰显价值。

trans-unit.source: Using these cmdlets you can perform:
trans-unit.target: 通过使用这些 cmdlet，你可以执行：

trans-unit.source: Set friendly name to a VLAN
trans-unit.target: 为 VLAN 设置友好名称

trans-unit.source: Add or associate VLAN to Trunk or Access on the port
trans-unit.target: 添加或将 VLAN 关联到端口上的 Trunk 或 Access

trans-unit.source: Start exploring by looking for all of the NetworkSwitch cmdlets!
trans-unit.target: 通过查找所有 NetworkSwitch cmdlet 开始探索吧！

trans-unit.source: More information is available in Jeffrey Snover’s WMF 5.0 Preview announcement blog post: <http://blogs.technet.com/b/windowsserver/archive/2014/04/03/windows-management-framework-v5-preview.aspx>
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 Jeffrey Snover 的 WMF 5.0 预览版公告博客文章：<http://blogs.technet.com/b/windowsserver/archive/2014/04/03/windows-management-framework-v5-preview.aspx>
